meanings.definition: A rotating machine or device for displaying or playing recorded music or images.
meanings.sent1: The carrousel at the fair played cheerful music as it spun around.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed riding the carrousel at the amusement park.
meanings.sent3: The carrousel decided to take a break from spinning and started playing music instead.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt like a carrousel, constantly rotating between different thoughts and memories.
meanings.sent5: The carrousel's colorful lights and music made it a magical experience for everyone.

meanings.definition: A circular conveyor belt at an airport for delivering checked luggage.
meanings.sent1: The carrousel at the airport slowly moved luggage around for passengers to collect.
meanings.sent2: Passengers eagerly waited by the carrousel to retrieve their bags after the flight.
meanings.sent3: The carrousel at the airport decided to take a nap, causing a delay in luggage delivery.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to move in a loop, like luggage on a never-ending carrousel.
meanings.sent5: The carrousel's constant rotation of bags made it easy for travelers to spot their belongings.

meanings.definition: A revolving circular platform for holding and displaying items for sale.
meanings.sent1: The carrousel in the store showcased the latest products to customers.
meanings.sent2: Customers were drawn to the carrousel to see the variety of items available for purchase.
meanings.sent3: The carrousel in the shop suddenly started spinning faster, causing products to fly off!
meanings.sent4: The carrousel of life turned, revealing new opportunities and challenges.
meanings.sent5: The carrousel's smooth rotation allowed customers to easily view all the products on display.
